message: Successfully implemented complete file watching and log streaming services with WebSocket integration

key_features: File system watcher with debouncing (100ms) to prevent event floods
JSONL log streaming with tail functionality and buffer for reconnection
Automatic discovery of existing log files on startup
Support for multiple subscribers per stream
Integration with WebSocket for real-time broadcasting
technical_implementation: LogStreamManager handles multiple concurrent log streams
BroadcastIntegrator bridges file events to WebSocket broadcasting
integration_points: Connects to WebSocket ConnectionManager via set_websocket_manager()
Broadcasts to task/agent/log subscribers based on event type
Supports filtering by active tasks to reduce noise
Provides buffer access for reconnection recovery
